SELECT a.class_name FROM (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_TIME from class where class_termin = 'N' and seq in(select inclass_class_seq from inclass where inclass_member_seq = #{member_seq} )) a, (select CLASS_TYPE,CLASS_MEMBER_SEQ,CLASS_NAME,REGDATE,SEQ,CLASS_TERMIN,CLASS_PARTICIPATION,CLASS_SD,CLASS_DEPA,CLASS_STARTTIME,CLASS_WEEK, CLASS_CD,CLASS_TIME from class where class_termin = 'N' and seq = #{seq}) b WHERE a.CLASS_SD<=b.class_cd and (a.CLASS_CD>=b.class_sd) and (to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi') <= (to_date(b.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+b.class_time/(24*60))) and ( to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')+a.class_time/(24*60))>=(to_date(a.class_starttime, 'hh24mi')) and REGEXP_LIKE(a.CLASS_WEEK,b.class_week)
